trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Malvern
There were no other sightings in Malvern on or around June 15th 1985
divs: Sighting Detailsin my parents back yard with girlfriend I happened to look up and their it was just hovering above tree I knew what it was she saw it to we were just shocked I think we where abducted it's like we noticed them when they wer ready to leave
Summary: Triangle shaped about 20 feet wide hovering above tree made no sound my friend and I watched it for couple of minutes then it just took off fast
